p: DENV-2 was also detected in Ae. aegypti, in mosquitoes collected in the municipality of Caxias in 2017, a result that corroborates the epidemiological information of the locality. In the same year, a total of 348 dengue cases were reported, with almost 90% of those (308) clinical-epidemiologically confirmed. In 2016, an increased number of cases was reported, and 1593 notifications and 520 confirmations were reported [ 84], characterizing a high incidence of dengue in the municipality.
